name: Jakiro
title: Twin Head Dragon
lore: A freak of nature with two heads that fight each other almost as much as their enemies. One breathes fire, the other ice.

dualBreath.name: Dual Breath
dualBreath.description: Jakiro breathes fire and ice, damaging and slowing enemies in a line.

iceBreath.name: Ice Path
iceBreath.description: Creates a path of ice that stuns enemies who walk through it.

liquidFire.name: Liquid Fire
liquidFire.description: Jakiro's attacks burn the target, dealing damage over time and slowing attack speed.

macropyre.name: Macropyre
macropyre.description: Creates a massive river of fire that burns enemies for massive damage over time.
